mapper.select: SELECT d.diary_id , d.diary_title , d.diary_content , u.user_id , u.username , u.age , u.email , u.auth , d.created_at , d.updated_at , d.deleted_at FROM diaries d LEFT JOIN diaries_linked_users du ON d.diary_id = du.diary_id LEFT JOIN users u ON du.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY d.diary_id

SELECT d.diary_id , d.diary_title , d.diary_content , d.created_at , d.updated_at , d.deleted_at FROM diaries d LEFT JOIN diaries_linked_users du ON d.diary_id = du.diary_id WHERE du.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT d.diary_id , d.diary_title , d.diary_content , d.created_at , d.updated_at , d.deleted_at FROM diaries d LEFT JOIN diaries_linked_users du ON d.diary_id = du.diary_id WHERE d.diary_id = #{diaryId} AND du.user_id = #{userId}
